title: High-Value NPM Developers Compromised in New Phishing Campaign
summary: A recent phishing campaign has targeted high-value NPM (Node Package Manager) developers, compromising their credentials and potentially affecting a vast array of software projects dependent on their packages. Once accessed, these credentials allow intruders to inject malicious code into widely-used packages, potentially infiltrating the software supply chain. title: Poor Passwords Tattle on AI Hiring Bot Maker Paradox.ai
summary: Paradox.ai, a company specializing in AI-driven hiring bots, recently suffered a data breach due to inadequate password security, leading to the exposure of sensitive information.
